title: Itzulia Basque Country: Vingegaard, Evenepoel’s Tour de France Plans in Balance after Brutal Crash; Peloton Points to Bumpy Corner as Crux
content:
Vingegaard in hospital with broken ribs and collapsed lung, Evenepoel: 'Long-term plans not in danger', Bilbao: 'We have to rethink the way we race'.

Read the full article at Itzulia Basque Country: Vingegaard, Evenepoel’s Tour de France Plans in Balance after Brutal Crash; Peloton Points to Bumpy Corner as Crux on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
